title: 6 Quintessence
body: For some reason I somehow have 6 Quintessence that I somehow be able to purchase from the shop. I already had 3 with me and forgot about it, so i bought 3 more thinking that I don't have them. There was an error message poped out but I still manage to bought them with IP. Now I have 6 quintessence that are the same sitting in my collection. Is this normal or can I get a refund on those runes?

replies.body: The problem have been solved thank you

Weeeeeell you certainly don't need more than 3 of the same type of Quint that's for sure. Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to get that reversed for you!
Is it normal? No. But don't worry, runes will be a thing of the past when they're replaced.
